Î¸(s)=Î¸start+s(Î¸endâˆ’Î¸start),sâˆˆ[0,1]s=s(t),tâˆˆ[0,T]\begin{aligned}\theta(s)&=\theta_{start}+s(\theta_{end}-\theta_{start}),s\in[0,1] \\s&=s(t),t\in[0,T] \\\end{aligned}Î¸(s)sâ€‹=Î¸startâ€‹+s(Î¸endâ€‹âˆ’Î¸startâ€‹),sâˆˆ[0,1]=s(t),tâˆˆ[0,T]â€‹

âˆ‚Î¸âˆ‚t=âˆ‚Î¸âˆ‚sâ‹…âˆ‚sâˆ‚tå…¶ä¸­âˆ‚Î¸âˆ‚s=Î¸endâˆ’Î¸startâˆ‚Î¸âˆ‚t=(Î¸endâˆ’Î¸start)â‹…âˆ‚sâˆ‚t\begin{aligned}\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial t}&= \frac{\partial\theta}{\partial s} \cdot \frac{\partial s}{\partial t} \quadå…¶ä¸­\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial s}=\theta_{end} -\theta_{start} \\\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial t}&=(\theta_{end} -\theta_{start})\cdot \frac{\partial s}{\partial t} \\\end{aligned}âˆ‚tâˆ‚Î¸â€‹âˆ‚tâˆ‚Î¸â€‹â€‹=âˆ‚sâˆ‚Î¸â€‹â‹…âˆ‚tâˆ‚sâ€‹å…¶ä¸­âˆ‚sâˆ‚Î¸â€‹=Î¸endâ€‹âˆ’Î¸startâ€‹=(Î¸endâ€‹âˆ’Î¸startâ€‹)â‹…âˆ‚tâˆ‚sâ€‹â€‹

Î¸\thetaÎ¸å¯¹tttæ±‚äºŒé˜¶å¯¼æ˜¯åŠ é€Ÿåº¦ï¼Œå³

âˆ‚2Î¸âˆ‚t2=âˆ‚(âˆ‚Î¸âˆ‚s)âˆ‚tâ‹…âˆ‚sâˆ‚t+âˆ‚Î¸âˆ‚sâ‹…âˆ‚2sâˆ‚t2å…¶ä¸­âˆ‚(âˆ‚Î¸âˆ‚s)âˆ‚t=âˆ‚(Î¸endâˆ’Î¸start)âˆ‚t=0âˆ‚2Î¸âˆ‚t2=(Î¸endâˆ’Î¸start)â‹…âˆ‚2sâˆ‚t2\begin{aligned}\frac{\partial^2\theta}{\partial t^2}&= \frac{\partial(\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial s})}{\partial t} \cdot \frac{\partial s}{\partial t}+\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial s} \cdot \frac{\partial^2 s}{\partial t^2} \quadå…¶ä¸­\frac{\partial(\frac{\partial\theta}{\partial s})}{\partial t}=\frac{\partial(\theta_{end} -\theta_{start})}{\partial t}=0 \\\frac{\partial^2\theta}{\partial t^2}&=(\theta_{end} -\theta_{start})\cdot \frac{\partial^2 s}{\partial t^2} \\\end{aligned}âˆ‚t2âˆ‚2Î¸â€‹âˆ‚t2âˆ‚2Î¸â€‹â€‹=âˆ‚tâˆ‚(âˆ‚sâˆ‚Î¸â€‹)â€‹â‹…âˆ‚tâˆ‚sâ€‹+âˆ‚sâˆ‚Î¸â€‹â‹…âˆ‚t2âˆ‚2sâ€‹å…¶ä¸­âˆ‚tâˆ‚(âˆ‚sâˆ‚Î¸â€‹)â€‹=âˆ‚tâˆ‚(Î¸endâ€‹âˆ’Î¸startâ€‹)â€‹=0=(Î¸endâ€‹âˆ’Î¸startâ€‹)â‹…âˆ‚t2âˆ‚2sâ€‹â€‹
